Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -0,0 +1,108 @@ +import React, { useRef, useEffect } from "react"; + +export default function CompanySettings({ data, update, save }) { + const logoRef = useRef(null); + const bannerRef = useRef(null); + + const onFile = (e, key) => { + const file = e.target.files?.[0]; + if (!file) return; + const url = URL.createObjectURL(file); + update({ [key]: url }); + if (key === "logo") logoRef.current = file; + if (key === "banner") bannerRef.current = file; + }; + + useEffect(() => { + return () => { + if (data.logo) URL.revokeObjectURL(data.logo); + if (data.banner) URL.revokeObjectURL(data.banner); + }; + }, []); +API + return ( +
+

Logo & Banner Image

+ +
+
+ +
+ {data.logo ? ( + + ) : ( +
+ No logo +
+ )} + onFile(e, "logo")} + /> +
+
+ +
+ +
+ {data.banner ? ( + + ) : ( +
+ No banner +
+ )} + onFile(e, "banner")} + /> +
+
+
+ +
+ + update({ companyName: e.target.value })} + className="w-full border rounded p-2" + /> +
+ +
+ +

Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -0,0 +1,108 @@ +import React, { useRef, useEffect } from "react"; + +export default function CompanySettings({ data, update, save }) { + const logoRef = useRef(null); + const bannerRef = useRef(null); + + const onFile = (e, key) => { + const file = e.target.files?.[0]; + if (!file) return; + const url = URL.createObjectURL(file); + update({ [key]: url }); + if (key === "logo") logoRef.current = file; + if (key === "banner") bannerRef.current = file; + }; + + useEffect(() => { + return () => { + if (data.logo) URL.revokeObjectURL(data.logo); + if (data.banner) URL.revokeObjectURL(data.banner); + }; + }, []); + + return ( +
